mainSequence.step: User posts Driver information (name, csp, driver) to Spider
Spider registers Driver and sends acknowledgment to the User
User posts Region information (name, csp, region, zone) to Spider
Spider registers Region and sends acknowledgment to the User
User posts Credential information (name, csp, credentials) to Spider
Spider stores the Credential information and sends acknowledgment to the User
User posts Connection Configuration (name, csp, driver, credential, region) to Spider
Spider configures the connection and sends acknowledgment to the User
Tumblebug creates the Namespace and notifies the User
